rawContent:
Something I've discovered is a GIANT part of the fight over trans rights:

Some specific flavors of Christian want to live in a world where their children are considered their chattel property. That is what they mean by "grooming." They will acknowledge that trans folks don't want to have SEX with kids when pressed, you can't call a person someone else empathizes with a rapist without negative blowback we're just humans trying to live, but what they shift to then is "they want is to get their "ideology" into the kid's head."

What is that ideology? That trans people exist, of course. That we aren't evil or deranged for existing.

The idea that we can tell a child "it's OK to be trans" counts as grooming. Because it isn't actually OK for their child to be trans, they would torture said child back into the closet. If you don't believe me, google Leelah Alcorn, google conversion therapy's suicide rate and then it's use on minors and make the two square without parents being more comfortable with a dead child then a trans one.

The side screaming about "protecting kids from trans ideology" are two steps away from saying they want to protect their right to put their kids in a coffin if they're too queer. Think about that.
